headline.main: Crunch Time for Rand Paul at U.S. Conservative Event
headline.print_headline: Crunch Time for Rand Paul at U.S. Conservative Event

docs.snippet: With Republican rivals like Scott Walker and Jeb Bush off to a strong start in the 2016 U.S. presidential race, Rand Paul will seek his own breakout moment at an annual gathering where hopefuls go to burnish their conservative credentials....
docs.lead_paragraph: With Republican rivals like Scott Walker and Jeb Bush off to a strong start in the 2016 U.S. presidential race, Rand Paul will seek his own breakout moment at an annual gathering where hopefuls go to burnish their conservative credentials.

headline.main: Dow Ekes Out Another Record Close Even as Other Indexes Slip
headline.print_headline: Dow Ekes Out Another Record Close Even as Other Indexes Slip

docs.snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average managed another record high close, but just barely, even as other market indexes edged lower....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average managed another record high close, but just barely, even as other market indexes edged lower.

headline.main: Takata Must Save Faulty Air-Bag Inflators for Litigation, U.S. Probe
headline.print_headline: Takata Must Save Faulty Air-Bag Inflators for Litigation, U.S. Probe

docs.snippet: A U.S. safety regulator on Wednesday ordered Takata Corp to preserve all air-bag inflators removed through a recall process as evidence for a federal investigation and private litigation cases....
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. safety regulator on Wednesday ordered Takata Corp to preserve all air-bag inflators removed through a recall process as evidence for a federal investigation and private litigation cases.

headline.main: Big 12's Chief Reprimands K-State for Court-Storming Case
headline.print_headline: Big 12's Chief Reprimands K-State for Court-Storming Case

docs.snippet: Big 12 Conference Commissioner Bob Bowlsby is publicly reprimanding Kansas State for failing to prevent Wildcats fans from pouring onto the court after the school's upset victory over rival Kansas....
docs.lead_paragraph: Big 12 Conference Commissioner Bob Bowlsby is publicly reprimanding Kansas State for failing to prevent Wildcats fans from pouring onto the court after the school's upset victory over rival Kansas.

headline.main: Review: Smith, Robbie Pour on the Charm in Sharp 'Focus'
headline.print_headline: Review: Smith, Robbie Pour on the Charm in Sharp 'Focus'

docs.snippet: If the mark of a good con artist is that he or she makes you think you know exactly what's going on — when of course you haven't a clue — that's also the mark of a good con-artist movie, isn't it? To make you feel like you totally get ...
docs.lead_paragraph: If the mark of a good con artist is that he or she makes you think you know exactly what's going on — when of course you haven't a clue — that's also the mark of a good con-artist movie, isn't it? To make you feel like you totally get what's about to happen — "Oh yeah, I've seen this in tons of movies," you think — and then, boom. That's not what happens at all. See, you lost your focus for a second.
